comment.author: 20958381@N08
comment._content: This looks suspiciously like Market street  to me.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I think this is looking east, across William Street (near Dowling St) from - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/5774623661/] NB - the roadworks, recently swept piles of gravel and the corner building at McElhone St, still recognizable as the Akubra shop in Google Maps Street View - g.co/maps/uebxq .

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: 72 William St has more than a passing resemblance to the corner building shown in this pic. A bit of a long shot though - www.photosau.com.au/cos/scripts/ExtSearch.asp?SearchTerm=... ...here's another pic www.photosau.com.au/cos/scripts/ExtSearch.asp?SearchTerm=... ...note though that in this Syer pic the shadows look as if they might intersect the kerb at ca. 45 degrees or so...which suggests that the street in this pic didn't quite run East-West...the shadows Syer's pic of the blokes sweeping muck outside the William St post office appear to be more acute...but maybe the pics were taken at different times of year...
